flawed_nl_solution:
To get the perimeter, you add all the sides o the triangles, so the first two sides add up to 40+50 = <<40+50=90>>90 cm.
If the perimeter of the triangle is 160, the remaining side is 160-90 = <<160-90=90>>90 cm.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
